name: Braveheart 2: Brave Hearter
description:
It's 1305. William Wallace - the Braveheart - has been hung, drawn and quartered. A Scottish immigrant to London, you have come to pay your respects. Little do you know that your actions might change history forever.

A short game with stealth and action elements. And a big dose of silliness. And a dog.

Everything made in 3 weeks for the Awful Jams Summer Game Jam 2018!

Features:

  • Over 10 minutes of 'exciting' gameplay
  • Historical innacuracy
  • Ghosts!
  • Dogs!

Requirements:

  • Windows 8.1 or better
  • DirectX 11 GPU (GeForce 660 or better recommended)

Credits:

Helen Dockery - Concept, Testing.

Emily Morton - 2D Art, Concept.

Adam Crawford - Code, 3D Art.
